page-events-meta-description: Discover upcoming Ethereum community events, conferences, meetups, and hackathons worldwide
page-events-subtitle: Discover the top crypto and blockchain conferences shaping 2025 and 2026. Explore major Ethereum events, Web3 meetups, and global gatherings driving the next wave of decentralized innovation.
page-events-community-hubs-description: You can join regular co-working sessions and community events in these permanent spaces, perfect for inspired work, learning, connecting, and building.
page-events-find-near-you-description: Search upcoming hackathons, community gatherings, and conferences around the Ethereum ecosystem.
page-events-upcoming-conferences-subtitl: Major conferences from the Ethereum community
page-events-for-organizers-description: Whether you are hosting a meetup, a workshop, a hackathon or a community gathering, there are teams that can provide guidance, resources and support so your event can make the most impact.
page-events-planning-event-description: We have written a comprehensive event guide with the support of the community, for the community.
page-events-ethereum-everywhere-descript: The Ethereum Everywhere team is an ecosystem amplification team within the Ethereum Foundation, supporting local communities and events in diverse ways to help them become successful and sustainable in the long-term.
page-events-guidance-description: Friendly advisory on planning and running successful events and communities that welcome new builders and users, help them onboard, and keep existing communities connected and engaged.
page-events-resources-description: Providing templates, best practices, updates, and opportunity boards to help organizers create consistent and engaging experiences.
page-events-connections-description: Support with finding regional partners, contributors, and speakers - plus visibility through community and social media channels.
page-events-organising-event-description: This is a non-exhaustive list maintained by our community. Know of an upcoming Ethereum event to add to this list.
page-events-no-results: No events found matching your criteria
page-events-city-description: Discover Ethereum meetups, hackathons, and conferences in {city}, {country}. Join the local community.
page-events-no-events-in-city: No events found in {city}. Check back soon or explore other cities.
page-events-no-cities-found: No cities found matching your search
page-events-geolocation-not-supported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser
page-events-geolocation-denied: Location access was denied. Please enable location services.
page-events-geolocation-error: An error occurred while getting your location
